english.segment1: I was taught to be practical in everything I do. Holding on to what is tangible, and then came You. That's when I found myself so far away, from everything I knew. I took a leap of faith
english.segment2: Even though You're difficult for me to explain. I know I'll never be the same
english.segment3: You're everything I cannot see. You're everything I cannot say. I know it all seems so illogical. But that's okay. You're the love You give to me. You're the love I give away. You are everything impossible. And that's okay
english.segment5: All the things that make no sense to me, draw me to You. Like finding freedom by surrendering, can it be true. With everything I can and cannot know. This mystery is bringing life to me
english.segment6: And all this love I have for You I can't contain. I know I'll never be the same
english.segment7: You're everything I cannot see. You're everything I cannot say. I know it all seems so illogical. But that's okay. You're the love You give to me. You're the love I give away. You are everything impossible. And that's okay
english.segment9: What's so hard to understand. What I cannot comprehend. Is that You love me the way I am
english.segment10: You're everything I cannot see. You're everything I cannot say. I know it all seems so illogical. But that's okay. You're the love You give to me. You're the love I give away. You are everything impossible. And that's okay
english.segment11: You're everything I cannot see. You're everything I cannot say. I know it all seems so illogical. But that's okay. You're the love You give to me. You're the love I give away. You are everything impossible. And that's okay
